CustomField.description: The URL link to the referral record number.
CustomField.formula: LEFT($Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_470, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & "/" & Id /*HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_470, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & "/" & Id, Name, Name )*/
CustomField.label: Record Number URL
